examples.example: 妈妈今天做了一道美味的瘦肉汤，我喝得非常开心。

translate.english: Mother made a delicious lean meat soup today and I drank it very happily.

examples.example: 多吃瘦肉可以为身体补充优质的蛋白质，让我们更健康。

translate.english: Eating more lean meat can supplement high-quality protein for the body and make us healthier.

examples.example: 妈妈用瘦肉和蔬菜为我做了营养丰富的午餐，我吃得很满足。

translate.english: Mother made a nutritious lunch for me with lean meat and vegetables, and I ate very satisfied.
